line: I'm afraid I have some bad news.
Is it the news that we suck? Because I really don't think I can take it.
Dude, what do you know about Romana Flowers?
All I know is that she's American.
American...
Amazon.ca! What's the website for that?
Amazon.ca.
You know what sucks?
What?
EVERYTHING.
I kind of feel like I'm on drugs when I'm with you. Not that I do drugs. Unless you do drugs. Then I do drugs all the time, every drug.
Dude, I'm changing!
Ah! Sorry. It's just cold.
Here. Does that help?
Yeah, that's very warm. What is that? Okay...
You cocky cock! You'll pay for your crimes against humanity!
You once were a v-gone, but now you will b-gone!
V-gone?
Wait! We're fighting over Ramona?
Didn't you get my E-mail explaining the situation?
I skimmed it.
Are you a pirate?
....Pirates are in this year!
You punched me in the boob! Prepare to DIE! Obviously.
You know what sucks the most?
What?
Everything...
This is impossible, how can this be?
Open your eyes, maybe you'll see.
Chicken isn't vegan?!
Hey! You totally came!
Yes. I did totally come.
She's with Gideon.
That's probably just because he's better than you.
This sucks! I'm gonna pee, due to boredom.
My name is Crash, and these are the boys.
Is that girl a boy too?
Yes.
Hi, I was thinking about asking you out but then I realized how stupid that would be.
So do you wanna go out sometime?
Kick her in the balls!
What do you play?
Wow, um, Zelda, Tetris... That's kind of a big question.
Where's Knives? Not comin' tonight?
Naw, we broke up. Hey, check it out, I learned the bass line from Final Fantasy 2
Scott, you are the salt of the earth.
Thanks!
Your BF is about to get F-ed In the B!
This song is called "I Am So Sad, I Am So Very Very Sad". It goes a little something like this. . . .SO SAD!!. . .Thank you.
It's not a race, guys!
All right, this next song goes out to the guy who keeps yelling from the balcony. It's called, "We Hate You, Please Die."
Sweet! I love this song!
We are "Sex Bob-omb." We are here to make money and sell out and stuff.
Sweet! Coins!
Every Pilgrim reaches the end of his journey. Some sooner than others.
Hey. What's with his outfit?
Yeah, is he a pirate?
Are you a pirate?
Pirates are in this year!
I can read your thoughts. Your will is broken. You're through.
Say we drink to my memory. Fair-trade blend with soy milk?
Oh, please. But that's pathetic.
Dude. I saw into your mind's eye. You put half-and-half in one of those coffees in attempt to make me break vegan edge. I'll take the one with soy. Thanks, tool.
Actually, muchacho, I put the coffee in this cup. But I thought really hard to put it in that one, 'in my mind's eye' or whatever.
What are you talking about?
You just drank half-and-half, baby.

How are we supposed to follow this?! We're not gonna win! We're not gonna sign with G-Man! We're not gonna play opening night as the Chaos Theater! Goddammit, Scott! Will you not just keep standing there, you're freaking me out!!
Good evening. I am Crash, and these are the Boys.
Is that girl a boy, too?
Yes...
I'm in lesbians with you.
This is, this is, this is...
What?!
This is boring.
Hey Ramona! I like your outfit. Affordable?
I want to have his adopted babies.
I've never kissed a guy,
Hey, neither have I.
We shouldn't even be here. We shouldn't even BE HERE!!!
Come on man! I put my promises aside for the music! If I can do that we can do anything!
Hey man. Question. I've always wondered how does not eating dairy products give you psychic powers?
Ok, right you know how you only use 10% of your brain? Well the other 90 is filled with curds and whey.
I gotta pee on her
I love garlic bread. I could honestly eat it all the time nonstop.
Then you'd get fat.
Why would I get fat?
Bread makes you fat.
Bread makes you fat!?
Your kidding. Anyone can be vegan.
Ovo-lacto vegetarian maybe
Ovo what?
I partake not in the meat nor the breast milk nor the ovum of any creature with a face.
Short answer, being vegan just makes you better than most people.
Bingo.
Because next time, I'll be deadly serious next time.
What?
Hey buddy!
Save it. You're pretentious. This club sucks. I got beef. Let's do it.
You know your hair?
I know of it.
It's all blue.
What's the password?
Ughh, whatever!
Cool.
Before you hear some dirty lies from someone else, yes I'm dating a 17 year old.
Awww, is he cute?
Oh ha ha.
Does this mean we have to stop sleeping together?
You see another bed in here?
Oh yeah, you're totally my bitch forever.
I'm Neil!
Hey, so can this not be a one night stand? For one thing, I didn't even get any...that was a joke.
Scotty, you can cheat on all the ladies you like... but you can't cheat death.
We all have baggage.
Yeah, well my baggage doesn't try to kill me every five minutes.
Is Scott here?
You know what? He just left.

Did you know that the original name for Pac-Man was Puck-Man? You'd think it was because he looks like a hockey puck but it actually comes from the Japanese phrase 'Paku-Paku,' which means to flap one's mouth open and closed. They changed it because they thought Puck-Man would be too easy to vandalize, you know, like people could just scratch off the P and turn it into an F or whatever.
If you want something bad, you have to fight for it. Step up your game, Scott. Break out the L-word.
Lesbian?
The other L-word.
...lesbians?
Lesbians?
It's "love", Scott.
If I peed my pants would you pretend that I just got wet from the rain?
It's not raining.
Kick her in the balls!
Scott, if your life had a face, I would punch it. I would punch your life in the face.
Young Neil, you have learned well. From this point forward, you will be known as... NEIL!
Not only do I wanna take part, I wanna take them apart!
I want her to geek out on us.
She'll geek. She geeks. She has the capacity to geek.
Look, I didn't write the gay handbook. If you got a problem with it, take it up with Liberace's ghost.
Go ahead. I'm too cool for you anyway.
The only thing separating me from her is the two minutes it's gonna take to kick your ass.
What a perfect asshole.
We are Sex Bob-omb and we are here to make you think about death and get sad and stuff.
Okay, presumeably, you may have just seen a dude's junk, and I'm very sorry for that... so is he.
You made me swallow my gum! That's going to be in my digestive tract for seven years!
You just headbutted my boyfriend so hard he burst.
Tell it to the cleaning lady on Monday.
What?
Because you'll be dust by Monday... because you'll be pulverized in two seconds. The cleaning lady? She cleans up... dust. She dusts.
So, what's on Monday?
'Cause... it's Friday now, she has the weekends off, so... Monday, right?
It was just a phase!
You hade a sexy phase?
I was just a little bi-curious!
Well honey, I'm a little bi-furious!
How'd you meet Knives?
Uhh, I've got to pee on her, uhh, I mean I've got to pee.
A long time ago, in a distant land, called Toronto, Canada.
Dating a high schooler?! Scandalous!
Am not! Who told you?
Wallace. Duh.
That gossipy bitch.
You know me.
Wallace!
What? I'm not afraid to hit a girl. I'm a rock star.
Oh my god. You punched the highlights out of her hair! He punched the highlights outta her hair!
Oh god, so alone.
Your not alone.
What?
Your just having some idiotic dream.
Does that mean we can make out?!
Guess who's drunk!?
I guess Wallace.
You guess right.
Okay, let's start with Launchpad McQuack.
That's not the actual title of the song.
We are Sex Bob-omb! And we're here to watch Scott Pilgrim kick your teeth in! One-two-three-four!
You are incorrigible.
I don't know the meaning of the word.
That's actually hilarious.
Scott if your life had a face I would punch it.
Yeah. Wait what?
I mean, are you really happy or are you really evil?
Evil? You mean, do I have, like, ulterior motives? I'm offended, Kim.
Wounded even?
Hurt, Kim.
A gig is a gig is a gig is a gig is a gig.
Double negative. Tricky.
Why can't we have secret shows?
All our shows are secret shows!
I'm gonna go pee due to boredom.
I don't think I can hit a girl, they're soft...
In the mysterious land of.... Toronto, Canada
That. Was. EPIC!
